author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Spark Therapeutics Reports Cash And Cash Equivalents And Marketable Securities Of $540.2 Mln As Of Dec. 31, 2017
text:
Feb 20 (Reuters) - Spark Therapeutics Inc:
* SPARK THERAPEUTICS REPORTS 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS AND RECENT BUSINESS PROGRESS
* SPARK THERAPEUTICS INC - AS OF DEC. 31, 2017, SPARK HAD CASH AND CASH EQUIVALENTS AND MARKETABLE SECURITIES OF $540.2 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
